blog.name: ruffireviews
blog.title: RuffiReviews
blog.description:
Hello everyone, My name is Kate but you probably know me as Ruffimutt or Ravermonki. I am a gamer and lover of all things popculture! I created this page to review some of my favorite or newly discovered things!

Want to get notification when I post a review? Log in to your tumblr and follow!

None of these reviews are sponsored or written by anyone else but me! This is purely my own opinion! If there is anything you would like me to review please let me know!

OTHER SERIES: Ruffi's Faves | Storytime | Ruffi Rambles | Ruffi's Screenshots | Ruffi's Resources | Ruffi's Tips | Art for Ruffi

TAGS: pokemon-reblogs|nintendo-reblogs|mario-reblogs|animal-crossing-reblogs|sonic-reblogs|gaming-reblogs|reblogs|reviews|tv-show-reblogs

The hat on my banner was drawn by greenmachine987

Business Inquires: ruffireviews@gmail.com

blog.name: december-dragon
blog.title: Once upon a distant winter night...
blog.description:
She/her. May 29. INFP. Ravenclaw. Chaotic good. Author of RusAme fanfics viewable under the tag "rusame fanfiction". Hetalia Fanfiction on FF (December-Writing-Dragon) or Ao3 (StarlightonInk).
Welcome! This blog shall contain posts covering many areas: Russian and Central Asian history/culture, Hetalia (primarily Aph Russia and RusAme), The Grisha Trilogy, Lord of the Ring, Yuri on Ice, and more.

summary: 'The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild' Sequel Officially Announced
body:

blog.name: luigiyoshi2210
blog.title: Like my art? You must reconsider XD
blog.description: Super Mario // The Walking Dead Game // Sherlock // Supernatural // Zootopia// Detroit: Become Human // Jess Glynne // Bastille // Mumford & Sons// Gorillaz // Has too many fandoms but draws about two or three of them // Is trying to focus on the ones I have right now before I like something else // Likes throwing my precious bois into some fandoms and makes a lot of crossovers // Luigi and Yoshi are the best // Light-hearted but also dark, obsessed with gay and can force it on any character I wish (uhhh)

summary: [4K] Borderlands 2 Ultra HD Texture Pack \ PS4 Pro Enhanced UHD Gameplay
title: [4K] Borderlands 2 Ultra HD Texture Pack \ PS4 Pro Enhanced UHD Gameplay
description:
The Ultra HD Texture Pack on console includes:

4K Ultra HD resolution and HDR for Xbox One X and PlayStation 4 Pro players

Remastered 4K environment textures, including geometry and skyboxes

Remastered 4K characters and vehicles

Updated weapon meshes and textures

Re-encoded 4K Cinematics

Improved Anti-Aliasing, including improved edge line implementation

This includes improved ink line definition and framing/outline around character models

Higher Resolution Dynamic Shadows

Improved quality and smoothness of shadows, especially during movement

Xbox One X Enhanced, featuring 4K Ultra HD and HDR. Increase the visual fidelity of Borderlands 2 and its DLC with this Ultra HD texture pack. Upgrade game textures including characters, vehicles, weapons and environments. Players will best appreciate detail at 4K resolution, but improvements can be enjoyed on other displays.* *Xbox One X required to install. 4K display required for 4K resolution.

During its PAX East 2019 panel today, Gearbox Software announced the Ultra HD Texture Packs for Borderlands: The Handsome Collection, Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel, and Borderlands 2.

The Ultra HD Texture Pack is a free visual upgrade which will be made available to both new and existing owners of the aforementioned games on PC, PS4 Pro, and Xbox One X.

On PlayStation 4 Pro, the texture pack will appear as downloadable content on the digital product page for Borderlands: The Handsome Collection. Subscribe to the VG247 newsletter Get all the best bits of VG247 delivered to your inbox every Friday!

If you play on PC or Xbox One X, you will have the option to download the texture pack for Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel and Borderlands 2 separately.

You’ll find many of the visual improvements automatically enabled when the Texture Pack is installed. There is no need to manually enable them in the in-game video settings menu. Pretty handy.

borderlands the handsome collection

Ultra HD Texture Pack for PC features:

Remastered 4K environment textures, including geometry and skyboxes Remastered 4K characters and vehicles Remastered 4K weapon meshes and textures Improved Anti-Aliasing, including improved edge line implementation This includes improved ink line definition and framing/outline around character models Higher Resolution Dynamic Shadows Improved quality and smoothness of shadows, especially during movement Improved Screen Space Ambient Occlusion An improved SSAO method for more realistic ambient lighting

The texture packs will be released next week on April 3.

NO COMMENTARY GAMEPLAY Guide Nintendo Switch NX Emulator Wii 3DS XL DS Apple iPhone 2019 Games Cheats #fru77y iPad 2020 iOS Google Android Play Steam Coop PLAYTHROUGH Solo Campaign 100% WALKTHROUGH 4K 60FPS Multiplayer LET’S PLAY Solution Complete Story Review 1080p HD Microsoft Xbox One X Enhanced 360 Achievement Sony PlayStation 2021 PS4 Pro Trophy PS3 Vita TV PSP Portable Console Windows PC Gaming

https://www.youtube.com/fru77y

On PlayStation 4 Pro, the texture pack will appear as downloadable content on the digital product page for Borderlands: The Handsome Collection. Subscribe to the VG247 newsletter Get all the best bits of VG247 delivered to your inbox every Friday!

If you play on PC or Xbox One X, you will have the option to download the texture pack for Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel and Borderlands 2 separately.

You’ll find many of the visual improvements automatically enabled when the Texture Pack is installed. There is no need to manually enable them in the in-game video settings menu. Pretty handy.

borderlands the handsome collection

Ultra HD Texture Pack for PC features:

Remastered 4K environment textures, including geometry and skyboxes Remastered 4K characters and vehicles Remastered 4K weapon meshes and textures Improved Anti-Aliasing, including improved edge line implementation This includes improved ink line definition and framing/outline around character models Higher Resolution Dynamic Shadows Improved quality and smoothness of shadows, especially during movement Improved Screen Space Ambient Occlusion An improved SSAO method for more realistic ambient lighting

The texture packs will be released next week on April 3.
